PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-00492016-02-05HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule VI to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (APAAN)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE VI TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (APAAN) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians and to fulfill Canada’s international obligations under the 1988 Convention by minimizing the risks of unauthorized activities with Alpha-phenylacetoacetonitrile (APAAN) and its salts, isomers and salts of isomers, including their use in the illicit production of methamphetamines in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0013 Publication Date: 2016-02-24
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Schedule VI to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (APAAN)
precis: Order Amending SCHEDULE VI TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (APAAN) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians and to fulfill Canada’s international obligations under the 1988 Convention by minimizing the risks of unauthorized activities with Alpha-phenylacetoacetonitrile (APAAN) and its salts, isomers and salts of isomers, including their use in the illicit production of methamphetamines in Canada.
